title: Minecraft1.6.1更新
author: lidarui
txt_content:
Minecraft1.6.1更新了：
Minecraft 1.6.1The Horse Update!Important: In order to get this update, you need the new “Minecraft Launcher". Download it here: http://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/1163345-new-minecraft-launcher and replace the old launcher.Changes in 1.6:+ Added Horses
+ Added Donkeys, Mules
+ Added Horse Armor
+ Added Leads
+ Added Carpets
+ Added Hardened Clay, Stained Clay
+ Added Block of Coal
+ Added Name Tags (item)
+ Added Hay Bales
* Texture packs are now “resource packs" that also can hold sound etc
* Food meter is now drained when healed by full food meter
* You can’t destroy blocks with a sword in creative mode
- Removed Herobrine


看最后一项......我去  Removed Herobrine 什么玩意？

replies.author: Clorviolt
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:
不要吐槽
这项更新自从Herobrine被发扬光大后就出现了
每个版本都有
mojang的恶趣味
其实你只要留点心 就能知道 每个版本更新信息里都有 移除HIM
